item.description:
Theme: Dreamscapes featuring body art by Nastaran

Models: Caitlin Elizabeth, Phyllis Marie, Colleen C

Hairstylist: Amanda

MUA / BODY PAINT : Nastaran Sharifi

Model Releases will be provided for this shoot.

What is a "Dreamscape" ?

When we think of landscapes, a lot of visual imagery comes to mind: fields, mountains, an area that is defined by nature. When we think of mindscapes, we review age-old ideas and values that are created within society.

By allowing ourselves immersion within the world of dreams, we can create our own version of what a "Dreamscape" truly is. Help us to define the broad concept of a Dreamscape in this meetup...

 

-The models will exemplify aspects of  grace and beauty.

- Body paint will be glittered pastels applied directly to the models' skin in order to achieve an angelic effect combined with the reflection from interesting lighting set-ups.

-The models will be able to be photographed at several stations, to decrease crowding between photographers so that all will achieve the chance to capture great images .

-The models will pose with flowy objects:  scarves, etc. and fans to evoke movement and create an ambiant simulation of "floating within the clouds".

-The lighting will highlight aspects of the body such as the models' skin-art (tattoos), muscle-tone shadows as well as the suttle sparkle from body-art applied by Nastaran.

This meet up will be truly unique and all are encouraged to engage in this meet up with an open mind :)

Coffee and refreshments will also be available.

Some samples of Nastaran's works:
item.name: Dreamscapes Photoshoot
